description: Try our easy to follow Passionfruit Possetts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Passionfruit Possetts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 10 passionfruit, halved (plus 2 extra passionfruit, halved, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop passionfruit pulp into a sieve over a bowl. Press down firmly with the back of a spoon to extract the juice (you will need 1/2 cup juice). Discard the seeds.
Stir cream and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat for 3-4 minutes or until sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice and 1/3 cup passionfruit juice.
Divide the mixture evenly between six 160ml-capacity serving glasses. Chill for 30 minutes or until set.

Meanwhile, combine gelatine with 2 tbs water in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on medium for 20 seconds or until dissolved. Add orange juice, remaining passionfruit juice and 4 tbs water. Stir gently to combine.
When the cream mixture has set, gently spoon a layer of gelatine mixture over the top of each glass. Refrigerate for a further 20 minutes or until gelatine mixture is set.
Spoon over whipped cream. Scoop pulp from extra passionfruit on top and serve.
